summary: 1999 MALIBU KEEPS EATING FRONT BRAKE PADS. REAR BRAKES NEVER WEAR. PEDAL IS ALWAYS SOFT. HAVE BEEN TOLD BY A FORMER MR. GOODWRENCH THAT THIS AN ONGOING ISSUE. HAVE TRIED TO GET GM TO RESPOND BUT THEY WILL NOT!!! I AM AFRAID THAT THE MAJORITY OF THE BRAKING IS OCCURRING IN THE FRONT AND THAT IN AN EMERGENCY STOP-FULL BRAKING ON ALL FOUR WHEELS MAY NOT OCCUR.  THANKS.     *NLM
